articles.title: Blood Clot "Very Rare" Side Effect Of Johnson & Johnson Vaccine: EU Drug Regulator - NDTV
articles.description: Europe's medicines regulator said Tuesday that blood clots should be listed as a "very rare" side effect of Johnson & Johnson's coronavirus vaccine, but that the benefits of the shot still outweighed the risks.
articles.content:
